    • Constructor Detail

      • BracketPane

        public BracketPane(Bracket currentBracket)
        Initializes the properties needed to construct a bracket. The constructor now includes methods that display the rounds above the corresponding place in the bracket
        Parameters:
        currentBracket - the current bracket

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> helper(int root,
                                                     int pos)
        Helpful method to retrieve our magical numbers
        Parameters:
        root - the root node (3,4,5,6)
        pos - the position in the tree (8 (16) , 4 (8) , 2 (4) , 1 (2))
        Returns:
        The list representing the valid values.

        public boolean isComplete()
        Requests a message from current bracket to tell if the bracket has been completed.
        Returns:
        True if completed, false otherwise.

      • isFinalized

        public boolean isFinalized()
        Is finalized boolean.
        Returns:
        true if the current-bracket is complete and the value of finalized is also true.
